price: Na mali yake yatamfaa nini atapo kuwa anadidimia?
arabic: وَمَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
footnotes: Na kitu gani katika adhabu ambacho hayo mali yake yataweza kumkinga nacho, atapo teketea yeye mwenyewe mzima?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā yugh'nī ʿanhu māluhu idhā taraddā
